app.name: Review Collect
app.short_description: The best option to optimize your customer reviews management.
app.long_description:
**Transform Your E-Reputation with Automated Review Collection**

Review Collect is the leading automated review management platform trusted by 500+ e-commerce brands across Europe. Our solution helps you multiply your customer reviews by 30x while maintaining a 4.9/5 average rating across all platforms.

**The Problem We Solve**

Only 2% of satisfied customers leave reviews spontaneously, while unhappy customers are quick to share negative feedback. This creates a distorted view of your brand online. Review Collect fixes this imbalance by making it effortless for happy customers to share their experiences on the platforms that matter most to your business.

**How It Works**

Our intelligent multi-channel system automatically reaches customers at the perfect moment through their preferred communication channel - SMS (98% open rate), email, or WhatsApp. Our AI analyzes customer satisfaction levels and intelligently routes positive reviews to strategic platforms like Google, Trustpilot, and Avis Vérifiés, while directing negative feedback to your support team for proactive resolution.

**Zendesk Integration**

When customers leave negative reviews (3 stars or below), Review Collect automatically creates support tickets in your Zendesk instance, allowing your team to quickly address customer concerns and turn negative experiences into positive outcomes. This integration provides:

- Automatic ticket creation for low-rated reviews
- Proper categorization with tags and priority levels
- Complete customer context from the review
- Instant notifications to your support team
- Better tracking and reporting than email-to-ticket methods

**Key Features**

- **Multi-Channel Campaigns**: Automated sequences across SMS, email, and WhatsApp with optimal timing
- **Smart Review Routing**: AI directs 5-star reviews to public platforms and alerts your team to issues before they go public
- **AI-Powered Responses**: Automatic personalized responses to Google and Trustpilot reviews in your brand voice
- **Advanced Analytics**: Weekly reports with NPS scores, sentiment analysis, and actionable recommendations
- **Seamless Integrations**: Native connections with Shopify, Klaviyo, Gorgias, WooCommerce, Magento, Zendesk, and more

**Klaviyo Integration Benefits**

Leverage your existing Klaviyo customer data and segmentation to supercharge review collection. Our integration allows you to:

- Trigger review campaigns based on Klaviyo events and customer segments
- Sync customer satisfaction data back to Klaviyo for enhanced segmentation
- Coordinate review requests with your existing email marketing flows
- Build targeted campaigns for high-value customers or specific product categories

**Proven Results**

- 39% average response rate (vs. 2% industry standard)
- 95% positive review rate
- 30x more reviews collected
- Average rating improvement from 4.2 to 4.7 in 30 days
- Setup in under 15 minutes

**Real Success Stories**

The Bradery, one of France's fastest-growing e-commerce brands, increased their Trustpilot rating from 3.4 to 4.6 in just 30 days and multiplied their review volume by 10x using Review Collect.

**Why Choose Review Collect?**

- **Fast Implementation**: Start collecting reviews in 15 minutes
- **Guaranteed Results**: See improvements within 30 days or get your money back
- **Priority Support**: Dedicated assistance via WhatsApp, email, and chat
- **GDPR Compliant**: Full compliance with European data protection regulations
- **No Long-Term Commitment**: Flexible plans that scale with your business

**Perfect For**

E-commerce brands, retail chains, online marketplaces, and any business looking to build trust through authentic customer reviews and dominate their online reputation.

**Data Privacy & Security**

We take your data security seriously. Review Collect is fully GDPR compliant and handles all customer data with the highest security standards. For complete details on how we protect and process your data, please review our privacy policy at: https://www.review-collect.com/privacy-policy

**Get Started Today**

Join 500+ brands transforming their e-reputation. Start your 48-hour free trial and see your first 5-star reviews within days.
app.installation_instructions:
**Step 1: Access Review Collect Dashboard**

Log in to your Review Collect account at https://www.review-collect.com

**Step 2: Navigate to Integrations**

Once logged in, locate and click on the "Integrations" menu in your dashboard navigation.

**Step 3: Find Zendesk Integration**

In the integrations list, you will see all available integrations including Zendesk. Locate the Zendesk integration card.

**Step 4: Connect Your Zendesk Account**

Click the "Connect" button on the Zendesk integration card.

**Step 5: Authorize the Integration**

You will be redirected to a Zendesk consent page where you can review the permissions that Review Collect requires:

- Create tickets in your Zendesk instance
- Read ticket information
- Update ticket properties

Review these permissions carefully and click "Accept" to authorize the integration.

**Step 6: Confirmation**

After accepting, you will be automatically redirected back to your Review Collect dashboard. The Zendesk integration status will now show as "Connected" or "Active".

**Step 7: You're Done!**

No additional configuration is required. Review Collect will now automatically create Zendesk support tickets whenever a customer leaves a review with 3 stars or below, allowing your team to proactively address customer concerns.
